title: Did not receive Captain Gankplank skin (played him patch 5.14)
body:
as you can see I played the gankplank rework but haven't received his skin yet.

3 people on my team  received the skin instantly but not me? i don't get it...

replies.body:
Hiya! 

We're working on handing out Captain Gangplank skins - it can take up to three days, so hang tight! :]

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=ilQ45iiZ,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-08-10T17:08:01.959+0000)
>
> Hiya! 
> 
> We're working on handing out Captain Gangplank skins - it can take up to three days, so hang tight! :]

I just got it! :D

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=ilQ45iiZ,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-08-10T17:08:01.959+0000)
>
> Hiya! 
> 
> We're working on handing out Captain Gangplank skins - it can take up to three days, so hang tight! :]

Hey katey, i posted a question on this account (i will post a link in this post for you to go to on the boards) and i was basically asking if  players who have been 14 day banned are automatically ineligible for season rewards. This was for toxic behavior. It would really really mean a TON to me if i can get a surefire or pretty accurate answer from you. Please! 


http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/GD/3GixgHUr-so-can-someone-give-me-a-100-answer-as-to-if-being-banned-will-prevent-ranked-rewards-this-season

Also I am not sure if we don't get the skin AFTER the 10th august.
After all they said that you get the skin after the event is over,but it looks like the event is still going.

> [{quoted}](name=GreenLore,realm=EUW,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=ilQ45iiZ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-08-10T10:17:10.653+0000)
>
> Also I am not sure if we don't get the skin AFTER the 10th august.
> After all they said that you get the skin after the event is over,but it looks like the event is still going.

no, black market is unavailable

But we still have the Gangplank login-screen and login-screens for certain events usually revert back to the newest champ-release loginscreen after the event.

Anyway the skin will probably unlock sometime during this week.These things can take a while.
I got mine instantly today. hue
All hail the insta GP skin receivers.

> [{quoted}](name=Grace de Dirty,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=ilQ45iiZ,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-08-10T10:18:53.599+0000)
>


hey look at that! I just caught a fish!

> [{quoted}](name=StayInBronzeNoob,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=ilQ45iiZ,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-08-10T11:14:44.426+0000)
>
> hey look at that! I just caught a fish!

lol you reported my post but you have a toxic name yourself.

 Sad.

> [{quoted}](name=Grace de Dirty,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=ilQ45iiZ,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2015-08-10T14:34:05.460+0000)
>
> lol you reported my post but you have a toxic name yourself.
> 
>  Sad.

I didn't report your post , there's a rioter in the thread, I don't know why they didn't force me into a name change, but I did it myself anywyas  I'm still waiting for the forum post name change.
It will take time for everyone to get theirs.

Wait that game was 13 days ago 
The event was August 5th-10th 
maybe that's why
